metadata.name: Punk Fiction - Episode #04 - Doom & Glory
metadata.description:
SOUND ON for voice over + music!

Punk Fiction is a collaborative multi-media crypto fiction and art NFT Project. The project brings together cross media storytelling around the CryptoPunk #5046 from LarvaLabs, owned by Galbraith alongside other famous and infamous CryptoPunks.

It's an on-going series of 1/1 NFT art + storytelling pieces, minted and sold through the platform Foundation, with each 1/1 piece being its own unique moment of storytelling + art + voice acting, involving Punk #5046 and other punks.

Episode #04 - Doom & Glory - Sees us drive deep into a renaissance inspired cyberpunk future, where the $2.2 million zombie, #3831, owned by the imitable Cozomo deâ€™ Medici, meets his brother at the end of a long road. An epic 7 minute 30 second spoken word story.

Art: Anton Skeor
Sound: Anton Shilo
Words + Voice - @ricgalbraith

Purchase comes with access to full 4k video + HD sound.
